articles.title: Hinton's Nobel win product of preserving amid doubts about neural networks
articles.description: TORONTO — The research that won Geoffrey Hinton a Nobel Prize for physics was the product of plenty of work carried out before artificial intelligence was the buzzword it is today.
articles.content:
